name: Tragedy of the Blue Kingdom
description:
Made with Twine.

This interactive story goes into detail about the events that led up to the fall of the Blue Kingdom of DreamWorld. The choices you make will decide the fates of the Blue Royals and their loved ones. 

The tale presented is only one piece of a story known simply as [Wanderers]. [Wanderers] is currently in development by CosmiK_Koto and their Co-Creator and best friend, GrimFuko.
